body_html:
@soumith does supporting CentOS 6.7 mean that it can actually live with glibc 2.12? I found that is the most recent version on the server I am using. and conda install glibc does not help.

Thanks very much. I will consider installing the current master.

body:
@soumith does supporting CentOS 6.7 mean that it can actually live with glibc 2.12? I found that is the most recent version on the server I am using. and conda install glibc does not help. 

Thanks very much. I will consider installing the current master.
